job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Integrate Generative AI into existing applications and workflows

     * Collaborate with ML scientist and engineers to Research, design and develop cutting-edge generative AI algorithms to address real-world challenges

     * Work across customer engagement to understand what adoption patterns for generative AI are working and rapidly share them across teams and leadership

     * Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem, help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions, deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers and guide customer on adoption patterns and paths for generative AI

     * Create and deliver reusable technical assets that help to accelerate the adoption of generative AI on various platform

     * Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder

     * Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer

* Integrate Generative AI into existing applications and workflows

     * Collaborate with ML scientist and engineers to Research, design and develop cutting-edge generative AI algorithms to address real-world challenges

     * Work across customer engagement to understand what adoption patterns for generative AI are working and rapidly share them across teams and leadership

     * Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem, help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions, deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers and guide customer on adoption patterns and paths for generative AI

     * Create and deliver reusable technical assets that help to accelerate the adoption of generative AI on various platform

     * Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder

     * Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the integration and development of Generative AI into applications and workflows, including research, design, and development of generative AI algorithms. It also highlights building RAG systems (implied by 'understanding adoption patterns' and 'guiding customer on adoption paths'), fine-tuning (implied by 'develop cutting-edge generative AI algorithms'), and developing user-facing solutions ('integrate Generative AI into existing applications and workflows', 'aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions'). The role involves creating technical assets, best practices, and engaging with various stakeholders, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on language, vision, and interaction.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Research, design and develop cutting-edge generative AI algorithms' directly relates to the creation and adaptation of AI models, which is the core of TASK3.
job_tasks.phrase: Research, design and develop cutting-edge generative AI algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate Generative AI into existing applications and workflows' implies building and deploying AI features into software systems, which falls under traditional software development tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate Generative AI into existing applications and workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'understand what adoption patterns for generative AI are working', 'Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem', and 'guide customer on adoption patterns and paths for generative AI' demonstrate an understanding of business context and translating business needs into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: understand what adoption patterns for generative AI are working

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem' and 'help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions' show an ability to understand business needs and align technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create and deliver reusable technical assets that help to accelerate the adoption of generative AI on various platform' implies building software components or tools that integrate with platforms, fitting into software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Create and deliver reusable technical assets that help to accelerate the adoption of generative AI on various platform

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder' involve communicating technical solutions to various business stakeholders.
job_tasks.phrase: Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction' involves understanding market needs and influencing product strategy, which is part of business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction

deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers
